title: Call for Online Auditions 2024
body:
Dear Musician,
like every year, it's time to welcome now members to our big musical family! If you're interested in taking part of ESYO's 2024 concert activities, you just have to submit us the application form and a short video of you playing. You can find all this information on the dedicated page on this website.
Looking forward to welcoming you in our orchestra!!!
